CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 21, 1949, pg. 11, reads: "Beauty Culturists... Chapter 77 has announced a Post Graduate Institute to be held in Pittsburgh, June 26-29, at the YWCA, for all Pennsylvania State beauticians and cosmetologists. Evelyn Meades is chairman and may be contacted for information at EM7.7306.  Pictured is the committee; left to right: Jennie Dobbins, Mary Bryant (standing), Evelyn Meades, Iola Smith, National President Carylon Dismond of Philadelphia, Ursley Kincaid, Christine Johnson and Mary Phillips. All beauticians are welcome. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of beauticians, from left: Jennie Dobbins, Mary Bryant, Evelyn Meades, Iola Smith, Carylon Dismond, Ursley Kincaid, Christine Johnson, and Mary Phillips, posed in interior with floral wallpaper and floral carpeting
